about_the_game:
Let's Beer together: Co-op Tavern Owner simulator

Welcome to your medieval adventure! As a tavern owner in a fantastical world, you’ll brew beverages, cook meals, manage resources, and fend off marauders hired by envious competitors. Invite your friends to join you and work at the tavern, creating a lively and collaborative experience.

About Game

Your goal? To rise as the top tavern in town by achieving a 5-star rating. The rating is influenced by customer satisfaction. It's not just humans you'll be serving—fantasy creatures like orks, dwarfs, and elves are also frequent visitors of your establishment, each with their own satisfaction indicator. Factors such as the tavern's temperature, service speed, and quality directly impact customer satisfaction. Yet, your path to success is filled with challenges. Competitors will try to thwart your progress by sending marauders to attack your tavern. It's up to you to defend your property and maintain your tavern's reputation.

Quotes

"It is Absolutely Insane!" - Hakim, CEO of BlackBox
"Oh My God!" - Tima, Visual lead Tasked
"Anything for Doner" - Amirkhan, 3D artist

Key Features

Realistic Tavern Management

Craft and Serve Drinks: Perfect your drink-pouring skills and prepare a variety of dishes to delight your customers.
Atmosphere Control: Keep your tavern warm and inviting with a cozy fireplace and by performing as a bard.
Upgrade Your Tavern: Expand and improve your tavern with additional rooms, unique decorations, and new facilities.
Defend Your Tavern: Protect your establishment from marauder attacks and pacify upset customers who might also cause trouble.
Repair and Maintain: Watch out for your furniture as enemies may try to destroy it.
Financial Management: Keep a close eye on your budget since many tavern activities come with a price. While you'll earn money from serving customers, the most significant expense will be reviving yourself or your team members.

Customer Satisfaction System

Keep Customers Happy: Monitor how satisfied your customers are and adjust your approach to improve your ratings. Unhappy customers can be more of a headache than marauders!
Boost Your Ratings: The higher your ratings, the more customers you'll attract, helping your business thrive.
Personalized Service: Serve the right food to the right customers—elves love wine, while orcs crave meat.

Team Play Mechanics

Team Up: Play on your own or join forces with up to 4 players. Only the tavern owner needs to have the game, so friends can join in the fun without needing their own copies.
Synergy: Collaborate with your team to cover all essential roles in the tavern, from waiting tables to acting as the security guard, ensuring smooth and efficient operation.
Your Tavern, Your Way: Whether you choose to specialize in serving the perfect beer or expand into an entertainment venue with a performer, security, an enhanced kitchen for cooking, and various activities for your team members, the choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes the possibility of battling in-game enemies using melee weapons. There is also a bleeding effect on the enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3050 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Meta PC
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Meta PC
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR headset
